CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 9, 1952, pg. 7, reads: Young Artists - Linda Greer, 12-year-old organist at Mount Lebanon, left, and little Carolyn Monroe, soloist, right, are two of the brilliant young artists who will appear on Ethnan Temple's Children's Talent Hour, 8 P.M. Sunday, Feb. 10. Little Patricia Prattis, pianist, pupils of Hayes Music Studio, and the Bethany Baptist Church Youth Choir are also slated to appear.  Mrs. Eunice Cook will emcee. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Linda Greer wearing light colored dress, seated at organ with sheet music, in church interior with carved wood paneling on walls
